GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Fetches an array of all articles, sorted by creation date in descending order. Each article includes a count of associated comments.

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Fetches a single article by its ID.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the specified article. Requires a username and body in the request.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increment (or decrement) the vote count of an article by a given amount.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with the given ID and returns no content (204).

GET /api/users.description: Fetches an array of all users.
